description:
Receiving a small bonus, the low-life freeter Kondou Natsuki goes home in a cheery mood.
But the next instant, he’s stark naked in the middle of a forest…
「Wait, I have breasts?…… And a tail too!?」

This is the story of Natsuki’s somewhat carefree life even after becoming a Dragonoid girl.>
